document.full_text: the fighting in libya spilled into tunisia when troops loyal to col. muammar el-qaddafi forced rebels from a border crossing and pursued them into a tunisian town.
document.title: libyan forces chase rebel convoy into tunisia, a rebel fighter says
lines_and_colors: the fighting in libya spilled into tunisia when troops loyal to col. muammar el-qaddafi forced rebels from a border crossing and pursued them into a tunisian town.
